website_summaries.verdict: In terms of versatility and durability, these unobtrusive placemats offer the best value for money.
pros: Woven vinyl lends a rich fabric appearance in an easy to clean package
Understated pattern blends well with any decor
Holds up well to frequent use and cleaning
cons: Only comes with four per set

customer_reviews.title: They really did the job!
customer_reviews.text: There were some bad reviews that made me hesitate to buy these but I’m glad I ignored them. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion but I really think these are very nice. It also depends on how you set up your table. They looked beautiful and very easy to clean. Red wine fell on it and it came right off. I will definitely recommend these placemats.
customer_reviews.author: Rjs111183

customer_reviews.title: Love our Artand Placemats!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Artland Placemats several months ago to use on the kitchen island. We absolutely love them! They are easy to clean and pair well with the kitchen barstools. The order process was smooth and easily. The order was received quickly and the place-mats were wrapped very well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Items came very secure in a large box so they werent folded... Very pleasantly surprised, solid weight to them... They are beautiful I am pleased Update: months and months later, still look great, sometimes food will get stuck in between the little holes but I just run under the sink. I only use 4 out of the 6 and I haven’t even replaced any yet with my extras. I highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and as described. I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are exactly what I wanted for my new kitchen table. They're basically a thin flexible plastic type of material but looks a lot like cloth.
customer_reviews.author: tbrown7800

customer_reviews.title: The design is outstanding the way the border is two tone it makes the table look inviting
customer_reviews.text: They went well with new tablecloth. Colors matched well and they are not flimsy like some. Well built
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of placemats.
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of people coming over back in the summer and I desperately needed some placemats for our new dining room table. These are great! Very sturdy, attractive, and clean up so easily with spills.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Mats are where its at
customer_reviews.text: Liked them. Used them with no complaints. They look and feel good. They are appear to take on different tones at different levels of viewing and that makes them even better. Havent washed or cleaned them yet so I cant speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Placemats
customer_reviews.text: These placemats make my table look fab. I like simple styles and this does just that! Easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: ADRIANA

customer_reviews.title: Simple and durable
customer_reviews.text: After getting a new table. I was looking for new placemats to match the table. These artland placemat did not disappoint. They look great on the table, keep hot plates safe from the table and looks great day and night. Recommend for anyone looking to get durable and nice looking placemat
customer_reviews.author: Julio M

customer_reviews.title: Great non-slip placemats
customer_reviews.text: Excellent placemats. Wanted to buy more as soon as I received them, but the blue color wasn’t available. It just came back, so I ordered more. I like the non-slip texture; use them on our kitchen counters and dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: These placements are really nice, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These placements are really nice, lightweight, and easy to clean. We've spilled beer, jam, flour, etc. on them and you can just shake or wipe them off. We haven't tried putting them in the dishwasher yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completes the room
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight placemats. I use them to put under my lamps on my end tables. That way no marks if someone sets a drink on the table. Perfect color to match my curtains and carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dickert

customer_reviews.title: Also a happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to prevent our table from damage from plates, mugs and glasses and a great look! Not cheap looking and durable and protective. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Beach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Excellent price and easy to clean. They look like high quality placemats. These work great, look great, and clean up great. Color is as shown. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: roza a.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fast delivery. beautiful color and matches perfectly for what I needed. Thank you!!!Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Persianprinces

customer_reviews.title: Theu look just like linen from afar but rinse clean so easily
customer_reviews.text: Theu look just like linen from afar but rinse clean so easily. They are perfect for the beautiful table we inherited from my husband's grandparents. I have no worries about my 5 year old dirtying the table or staining a nice fabric placemat.
customer_reviews.author: arkp

customer_reviews.title: Love These Placemats!!
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are are very easy to keep clean and always look great. I never have to worry about stains. Wish I had switched to these from the fabric ones years ago.
customer_reviews.author: suebee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice placemats!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very elegant. My only issue is that one of the placemats were shipped folded in half and one still had the crease in the middle even though it’s been laying flat on my kitchen table. Nice placemats though.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Clean up well!
customer_reviews.text: My kids aren’t the neatest eaters, so I was pleasantly surprised when stuck-on food washed right off with a damp washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gee

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Husband picked these for our new table. I wasn't sure at first but they are actually nice. Also easy to clean I love that about them! Much better then fabric placemats I was always washing my old ones that were fabric. With these I just wipe them down as I wipe the table.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom, I needed placemats that I could quickly wash and keep nice looking. These are perfect! They keep their shape and are easy to rinse off. Super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Burger

customer_reviews.title: They look really nice but the mats are not completely solid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my new wooden table. They look really nice but the mats are not completely solid, they are tightly woven like a basket with plastic threads. This leaves really tiny holes in the mats and so the steam from a hot plate will go through them and create moisture and sometimes stickiness underneath. I always have to wipe down my table after every use. More for decoration in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Permanently stained in less than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The placements were nice when we received them, however the reason for buying vinyl/plastic placements is durability, so you don’t need to throw them in the laundry all the time like with fabric. Just had spaghetti last night, and took the placemats to the sink to wash after dinner. Sauce had splashed on the placemat and permanently stained it. Soaking, scrubbing, did not clean it. So they lasted less than 2 weeks. I know they are inexpensive but I expected them to be more durable than this!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Red

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistant and a nightmare to clean
customer_reviews.text: Nightmare to clean and not heat resistant. Hot bowl set on top of the mat caused white heat marks on my table. I’m going back to plastic mats that can be easily wiped down or fabric that can be thrown in the laundry. Looks nice on the table, but even the smallest stain takes forever to clean off and dry. Food stains get trapped in the small holes. Once the stain is dried, you have to work really hard to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Honda

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I could do without these. I'm not sure why the other reviews are so great. First of all, I do not consider something "waterproof" when the water gets through all the holes. They are easy to wipe off and moisture does not effect them, but what is the point when all the water/juice/milk etc ends up on the table anyways. Second of all, they are very flimsy! I expected something a little nicer. I bought 2 sets based on previous reviews, but I will be looking for something better that actually keeps my table from being ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A.

customer_reviews.title: Not stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these and the ability to wash them is nice. However, I realized after my 4 year old son ate spaghetti, he'd dropped a bit on the mat. Now the placemat is stained. I will be attempting to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: NOT HEAT RESISTANT!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these place mats out the day that they arrived and after our meal I removed them from my wood dining table only to find a white area left from under each mat that defiantly was from the heat of our plates! This is why I purchased them, to protect my table! In my opinion these mats are garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Kats View

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: The placemats arrived to day. Unfortunately they arrived damaged. And since it's just water resistant material I'm not sure how to fix the wrinkles in them. It literally looks like a heavy box was placed on top on them and left them there untill I bought them. I'm sorry that my review couldn't be more better. But the morale of the story is, this material doesn't come back from being folded or created, it stays like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Quick

customer_reviews.title: Will ruin your wood table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst, ironic how I bought these to protect my table and it's what ended up ruining it. They are not heat resistant, on the contrary if you put a hot plate on top it would discolor your table permanently. Now I have six ashy cloudy spots on my table 😩
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Heat resistant??
customer_reviews.text: So these look good and are super easy to clean, BUT, maybe I misunderstood the meaning of “heat resistant”. I took it to mean that heat would not go through and stain my table. I placed a hit plate of food on thanksgiving and the heat went through and stained my table! Im very upset. So now i have to place a thick mat underneath these in order to protect my table. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: MARLYN433

customer_reviews.title: These placemats lay flat beautifully, the colors were spot on for what I ...
customer_reviews.text: These placemats lay flat beautifully, the colors were spot on for what I desired. They are very thin and unobtrusive. The descriptor of heat resistant is accurate, though they are not thick enough to provide any protection to the surface below if a hot dish is placed on top. The weave allows for gaps, but it still cleans up easily. Again, however, it will not protect the surface below from spills. The heat and spill protection factors are why it gets 4 instead of 5 stars. All in all it is a good product and serves my need.
customer_reviews.author: JL Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at and feel but wont protect your wood table from heat....
customer_reviews.text: Overall 3 starts. Heat resistance is not the biggest value. These are purchased to protect your table from heat and spills if the table is a good wood. Well you wont get protection from heat transfer as the placemats are almost see through. They are very nice dont get me wrong but you would need a better protection mat under It to prevent heat transfer.
customer_reviews.author: EnLHernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I changed the color scheme, (for my table area), and needed a nice looking set of tan place mats. These are a great value, for a set of four. At this price, if you got a stain on them, and weren't able to get it off, you could easily buy a replacement set. I like that they have a subtle design, and still look classy. Not only will these protect my table from hot dishes, which can leave white marks, on wood, but also from scratches, (which tended to happen, from groceries being placed on the table). Also, they just really elevate the look of my table, and tie in the other tans, that I have, in the area.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Will not protect table from liquids
customer_reviews.text: As long as you are not looking for something to keep liquids off the table these will do nicely. I am sure they will be easy to clean. I, however, was expecting a solid plastic with the look of weaved fabric so that I could protect my wood table. Unfortunately for me, these are made of plastic threads closely woven together with some kind of heat setting to keep it together. This leaves tiny openings for liquids to flow through freely. I'll keep them for camping.
customer_reviews.author: JaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor QA. Arrived with creases that don't come out.
customer_reviews.text: These would be perfect, easy-to-clean placemats, but all six of mine have an indentation (arrow-shaped) of the exact same shape, size and location on each. I thought that washing them with soap and scalding water, then drying them with paper towels in between with a heavy cutting board with books on top would remove the creases, but they are exactly as before (and similar to photos in other reviews). See photos. Very annoying! Do not recommend until they get rid of this production error.
customer_reviews.author: Determiner of all Things

customer_reviews.title: They are OK, but not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: The placemats look nice, easy to clean, even dishwasher safe. I'm disappointed that they are not waterproof. We used them for about 4 weeks and ended up with multiple water stains on our wood table.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: OCD? You may want to look elswhere
customer_reviews.text: Picture is very good representation of product/color. These are woven PVC. So far have not had to wash, just shake the crumbs off. Wet food if left to dry on mat may be hard to clean as there are lots of little crevices in the weave. Mats we received are not quite "squaer", so if you're really fussy about lining these up with edges of table and each other, these will drive you nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for solid vinyl place mats to protect ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for solid vinyl place mats to protect tablecloth. These are basket weave see through design and if you spill something on them they will leak through. I just assumed they would be solid. My mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a place mat that, if you spill something on it, you could wipe off. It's a woven plastic material. Don't get me wrong... they are very nice looking. Good for a holiday but not for every day use. If you drip something it would go right through the weave and you would have to rinse it out under running water and most likely onto the tablecloth you are trying to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Boni Federici

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look & feel of these placemats. My problem with them is crumbs stay in the indentations constantly and although they are black & gold, when I look at them at a distance I can see grease maybe from greasy children's hands. I have held them under running faucets because cloths & paper towels don't do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute ! Not spill resistant for those who would like to know. But they are easy to clean. 2 of mine did stain though. So I would not call it stain resistant either && they tend to go up from the edges. Overall I am satisfied as it makes my table look very nice. That was my main purpose. For those with kids. Just wipe them down along with the table of your children have spills.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Super thin but they look nice and will do the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super thin but they look nice and will do the job. I have these on a wood table and they do move around pretty easy, if you are looking for something that is definitely anti-skid, like this claims, I would probably look in to another set.
customer_reviews.author: Steelstorm

customer_reviews.title: Best place mats ever
customer_reviews.text: Second set of these placemats. I we decorated then ordered a second set a different color. Very classy looking. Shiny heat resistant rich color easily washed just put in the sink wash with a sponge and rinse off they will last for years without ever changing their texture or a lock
customer_reviews.author: D. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Whoever made a packing just ruined the mats
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for these placement mats and they arrived...Beautiful, but whoever pack them ruined by folding in half. Thank you very much, you have ruined family dinner for special occasion. The mats didn't seem to recover, under lights you will always see those folded line. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be very nice and look great on our kitchen table. Not being cloth is the huge benefit to these as they are so easy to clean off after kids spill stuff on them. Cloth ones would go in washer and dryer and then look like crap. Not these. Very pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: bballbm

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice placemats for the price. I bought them for one of our rentals to protect the wood table and I feel confident they will do that. They look nice and because they’re a plastic material they’ll feel cleaner than cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Placemats that serve their purpose but aren’t very attractive to me. Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted something attractive and easy to use and clean for my table. These to me just looked ok. Nothing special in my opinion. Things get into the little grooves and that can be hard to wash out but they serve their purpose. I personally would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Not Stain Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Product states stain resistant. Disagree. Used these 6 times and husband spilled teaspoon spaghetti sauce on placemat so after dinner I tried washing it by hand with little dish detergent stain won’t come out. Would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: sandra l helms

customer_reviews.title: They are definitely not heat resistant to the table these ...
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely not heat resistant to the table these are placed on. Maybe I misunderstood their claim of being heat resistant. My brand new dinning room table was ruined because the heat of the plates went through the woven parts of the placemat. 6 discolored heat spots on my table that I cannot find a fix for without completely re staining. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pad resists heat but allows heat thru to your  table
customer_reviews.text: These don’t keep heat off the table. They don’t melt so I guess they are resistant but the weave allows heat thru to mare the table. Not easy to clean food out of the woven fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and how it looked on my table. The reason why I’m giving it 3 stars is that they arrived folded in a yellow envelope. I thought they would smooth out over time, but the crease stayed on them. Also, they are not heat resistant, as it is stated. I have served how soup in a bowl, and it has left a white heat mark beneath the placemat. Keep in mind that this is a bowl, not a hot pan, or anything of that sort. I still use them, but I’m just very careful when serving hot plates. They are also hard to clean, especially when you have little ones that can’t keep everything on their plate.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi China

customer_reviews.title: Spills lead to permanent stains
customer_reviews.text: The product is as pictured and arrived in the given time frame. While they are heat resistant, they are definitely NOT stain resistant....a few drops of fruit pie filling or spaghetti sauce, and the placemats are stained forever even though I attempted to clean them right after dinner. I now have 3 placemats that are permanently stained after just a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not what I believed it to be.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be waterproof, meaning to me that water would not seep through. Error. Water still got through and stained my table. Not too happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Not stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: Great color and look but not stain resistant, I gave two young boys .
customer_reviews.author: Janna Houchens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Received these placemats and placed them on our table. Initially, you have to put them down and get them to flatten out due to how they come in the box. However, after that, they are easy to clean and complement the table very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allor

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was totally for these because of the price and reviews but this isn’t stain resistant. Food particles and spills go through the placemats and are very hard to clean. Wouldn’t recommend these if you actually use them and or have kids. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jones

customer_reviews.title: thin mats not stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: ruined on first use because spaghetti sauce stain will not come out. They are very thin so the stain is visible on both sides. I can only reccomend these if you are looking for very thin mats and mostly for looks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about a month and they are stained and very hard to clean. They are also porous so spills seep to the surface underneath. I wish I had know prior to buying. I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Why buy a table mat if the table still gets dirty with this mat?
customer_reviews.text: Really worthless, bought it looks nice but the table still gets dirty, if you spill a liquid this mat won’t hold the mess because it has tiny holes. The whole point of a mat is to hold messes and this won’t do the trick. Besides that, if a grease stain gets on it it won’t come off not even if you wash it in the machine. No good 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Celia Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Great Placemats - but don’t get tomato sauce on them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these placemats and have several sets in different colors . They look great and most things clean up well - crumbs and small stains. BUT, don’t get any kind of red sauce on them. I cannot get these kinds of stains out and several of the placemats are completely ruined. I use the placemats mainly for “show” and take them off the table when we are actually eating.
customer_reviews.author: elyse ferris kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Not a typical placemat
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of this product. Yes it is heat resistant and yes it is easy to clean, however it is basically a screen and not your typical placemat. Does not absorb liquids like a placemat normally does
customer_reviews.author: EH06

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would “wipe clean” as the description says. This is not true. Food particles get in the weave - not in the holes, but wedged in between the fibers. Even running them under the sink they the particles won’t come out. I’m going to try in the clothes washer, but I really didn’t expect this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl material slippery.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good backup surface for writing on paper w/ ballpoint pen, e.g., doing crosswords or suduko. Slides on table. When cutting food on a plate, the placemat slides around and the plate with it: annoying. Easy to clean. Low priced.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mancine

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These were much too thin and rough around the edges for what I needed. I didn’t use them, so I can’t really rate them, except they weren’t for me
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Great mats
customer_reviews.text: I like the color I chose and the ease of use. They’re outside on a patio table and are virtually maintenance free except for the occasional post meal quick wipe down when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Place mats
customer_reviews.text: I like these placemats. I have a glass table. These mats don't slip around the table. They stay where I put them and are easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Munger

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: This most likely requires hand wash/upkeep to not stain. We waited until the end of the week to do cleaning and put it through a hot wash in the dishwasher after a spaghetti stain night but still didn't get off. Took a couple of days but the shape eventually went back to normal. If you need a simple one, this is great. We have messy kiddo so, we'll probably end up switching to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, inexpensive place mats
customer_reviews.text: The mats are a great value. They look great on my table, very easy to clean and are made of durable material. Not one complaint thus far. Would buy again. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Okay, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t too easy to clean. I put them in the washer and some stains came out. But then you have to place a heavy object to flatten them out. Or give it a couple days for them to regain shape. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: suziqq

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I believed the reviews for these placemats. However the reviews were way off. Don’t waste your money on these, they’re junk.
customer_reviews.author: EJA's Nana

customer_reviews.title: Mostly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Anything red will stain it, but they are really attractive for plastic placemats. I've had to stop giving them to the kids on pasta night.
customer_reviews.author: Nellular

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I use these mats under stainless steel pet food bowls. Old mats were stained by the bowls. These aren't. Quite attractive and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Pat O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Welcome accent to the dining table
customer_reviews.text: In getting a new dining set, this was the first time I had really dark wood table. I wanted something to keep the scratches, marks and stains to a minimum. These placemats do just that and look good also.
customer_reviews.author: jmy

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can just wash it in the sink. No more worrying about having to throw it in the washer/dryer and ironing. Easy cleanup for immediate use again. I have a messy 5 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Barbeedoll77

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with these placemats. They have little ridges and if you get anything on them it gets down in the ridges and very hard to clean. Even after cleaning they look dirty. Also they are porous...you can see through them and liquids seep through to the table. I thought they were solid or I wouldn't have purchased them. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom Approves!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my mom and she liked the way the looked and felt. We've been using them for our dinner table and we've enjoyed them. They are also easy to clean! Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Born2Win

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, ready for testing.
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty, I have not tested the heat resistance yet, but will shortly. Arrived as described. Great job.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: They look pretty but don’t protect your table and aren’t skid proof.
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. They aren’t skid proof AT ALL and they did nothing to protect my table from heat. I now have steam/water marks in a woven pattern on my table from a plate after only ONE use. I like the look and feel, but they’re absolutely pointless otherwise. Will be trying to return them if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Florence

customer_reviews.title: durable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: selected black & gold for the dinning room table. I leave these in place to prevent guest from inadvertent setting hot plates on this table...I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: fargozombie

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. As they are a neutral color they go well with everything in dining room &easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My mom's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves those placemats. It provides protection to the table, and it is easy to clean. My mom has been asking me to get this kind of placemats for a long time, and I finally found it. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color very much and it suits my table perfectly. It feels that the material is pretty good. Most importantly, it’s easy to clean and won’t get oily like other plastic placemats.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect place mats
customer_reviews.text: Great place mats. Look like cloth but are of a woven plastic that is stain resistant and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Dale Musser

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. I haven’t really put anything very hot on it so I’m not sure about heat resistance. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lr Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I cant attest to how heat or stain resistant they are but I will say they are very nice and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Nory M. Aldama

customer_reviews.title: Stays good looking and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I used these place mates on my everyday table. They stay good looking and wipe off with a wet cloth. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Booth

customer_reviews.title: Happy w these
customer_reviews.text: I’m liking these, they come clean w a very quick rinse from my sprayer. It’s saving me placemat laundry!
customer_reviews.author: MILK+HONEYS

customer_reviews.title: They are plastic looking
customer_reviews.text: I wanted more of the cloth material and these came in looking plastic - i guess they are heat resistance / easy to clean/ stain resistant and very cheap looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not full size, very small. Not water proof and don’t trust for heat. Not at all worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love these placemats! They are so cute and match my farmhouse decor. They work very well as far as water resistance goes. I have two little kids who both spill frequently and these mats do a good job. I've noticed some staining (mainly from pizza sauce) which is too bad but I still love these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice mats
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but they seem to be really nice. the edges can turn up a bit though
customer_reviews.author: William Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Good looking place mat
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking mats. Not too sure of how heat resistant are they, but they are stain resistant and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kim

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to find placemats that I liked on our new table. I think I finally found a set! I like that they are interchangeable and you can flip to the side you like more. They are smaller than the placemats we had previously but these look nicer. I cannot attest to how well they clean and if liquid sleeps through yet. They arrived flat in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, look very good
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The only thing a little bend from the package, but I put something heavy on top to make it flat
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick to table. Slides easily
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected. Thought the mat wouldn’t slip off a slippery surface but it slides right off
customer_reviews.author: Litlefish

customer_reviews.title: it looks great
customer_reviews.text: it looks great with our red table cloth. its easy to wash and protects our table clothe when we're setting up food on the table.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the beige and the black. They are very high quality and wipe clean easily. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not packed great, so the middle impression are not out yet
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, but they should have been rolled NOT folded so I have apparently permanent creases in the middle. Not a killer, but I wish someone was using their brain on the packing side
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: Stains Easily
customer_reviews.text: Stains easily and can’t remove. Soaked in hot soapy water but didn’t help. Le sigh
customer_reviews.author: Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: These mats are not heat resistance! Everyone we put our plates on these mats they leave the burn white mark on our table! I’m going to be looking for other mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie M

product_meta.title: Artand Placemats, Heat-Resistant Placemats Stain Resistant Anti-Skid Washable PVC Table Mats Woven Vinyl Placemats, Set of 4 (Beige)
feature_bullets: Size in:18"X12"(45cmX30cm),Set of 4. Composition: 70% PVC, 30% polyester
Ultra-durable, uv protected to resist fading, designed to last for years with daily use.
Designed to resist heat.Made of high temperature resistant material of PVC to 176°F.Raw materia made in Germany
Top-grade exquisite design placemats feel good would be the best decoration and Protection to your tables.
